page.title: 07CORNBURY GAME DEPT. WORK
page.content: Besides {managing the Park Deer and {Pheasant programme}, the {Head Keeper {and 5 assistants} must {control }the { {pests in Wychwood }to allow the young {planted trees} to become established for the {future}. Indigenous {Fallow {Deer}do the most {tree damage} and damage crops too. Their numbers are large but unknown because they move around. They are {shot in Winter from {high seats with telescopic sights on {deer rifles. 130}were {killed}last year.{ Grey Squirrels strip young {Beeches }and are also {controlled.} Predators on eggs and young birds are kept down. {Mink}, a vicious newcomer, are appearing.{Magpies }have increased greatly recently to the detriment of small birds. {Carrion Crows, Stoats, {Weasels and Foxes }are the other main{ {predators,} who need to be kept in{ {ecological equilibrium.}
